verses.kjv: Paul and Timotheus, the servants of Jesus Christ, to all the saints in Christ Jesus which are at Philippi, with the bishops and deacons:
verses.web: Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ; To all the saints in Christ Jesus who are at Philippi, with the overseers and servants:
verses.ct: From Paul and Timothy, servants of Jesus Christ — to all of God's people in Christ Jesus at Philippi, along with your bishops and deacons:

verses.kjv: Grace be unto you, and peace, from God our Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.web: Grace to you, and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: May grace and peace be yours from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: I thank my God upon every remembrance of you,
verses.web: I thank my God whenever I remember you,
verses.ct: Every time I think of you, I thank my God.

verses.kjv: Always in every prayer of mine for you all making request with joy,
verses.web: always in every request of mine on behalf of you all, making my requests with joy,
verses.ct: Whenever I pray for any of you, I do it with joy,

verses.kjv: For your fellowship in the gospel from the first day until now;
verses.web: for your partnership in furtherance of the Good News from the first day until now;
verses.ct: because you've been my partners in spreading the gospel from the very first day until now.

verses.kjv: Being confident of this very thing, that he which hath begun a good work in you will perform it until the day of Jesus Christ:
verses.web: being confident of this very thing, that he who began a good work in you will complete it until the day of Jesus Christ.
verses.ct: I'm absolutely confident that God, who started this good work in you, will carry it through to completion by the day of Jesus Christ.

verses.kjv: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all, because I have you in my heart; inasmuch as both in my bonds, and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel, ye all are partakers of my grace.
verses.web: It is even right for me to think this way on behalf of all of you, because I have you in my heart, because both in my bonds and in the defense and confirmation of the Good News, you all are partakers with me of grace.
verses.ct: It's only right for me to feel this way about all of you, because you hold a special place in my heart. Whether I'm in chains or out defending and confirming the gospel, you've shared in God's grace right alongside me.

verses.kjv: For God is my record, how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ.
verses.web: For God is my witness, how I long after all of you in the tender mercies of Christ Jesus.
verses.ct: God is my witness — I long for every one of you with the deep affection of Christ Jesus himself.

verses.kjv: And this I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment;
verses.web: This I pray, that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and all discernment,
verses.ct: Here's what I pray: that your love will keep growing and growing, hand in hand with knowledge and sharp discernment,

verses.kjv: That ye may approve things that are excellent; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ;
verses.web: so that you may approve the things that are excellent, that you may be sincere and without offense to the day of Christ,
verses.ct: so that you can recognize what truly matters and live with pure hearts, free from blame, until the day of Christ.

verses.kjv: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are by Jesus Christ, unto the glory and praise of God.
verses.web: being filled with the fruits of righteousness, which are through Jesus Christ, to the glory and praise of God.
verses.ct: May your lives overflow with the fruit of righteousness that comes through Jesus Christ, bringing glory and praise to God.

verses.kjv: But I would ye should understand, brethren, that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel;
verses.web: Now I desire to have you know, brothers, that the things which happened to me have turned out rather to the progress of the Good News,
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, I want you to know that everything that's happened to me has actually helped the gospel move forward.

verses.kjv: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace, and in all other places;
verses.web: so that it became evident to the whole palace guard, and to all the rest, that my bonds are in Christ,
verses.ct: The entire palace guard — and everyone else around — now knows that I'm in chains because of Christ.

verses.kjv: And many of the brethren in the Lord, waxing confident by my bonds, are much more bold to speak the word without fear.
verses.web: and that most of the brothers in the Lord, being confident through my bonds, are more abundantly bold to speak the word of God without fear.
verses.ct: On top of that, most of the believers here have grown bolder because of my imprisonment. They speak the word of God with more courage and without fear.

verses.kjv: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife; and some also of good will:
verses.web: Some indeed preach Christ even out of envy and strife, and some also out of good will.
verses.ct: It's true that some preach Christ out of jealousy and rivalry, but others do it with genuine goodwill.

verses.kjv: The one preach Christ of contention, not sincerely, supposing to add affliction to my bonds:
verses.web: The former insincerely preach Christ from selfish ambition, thinking that they add affliction to my chains;
verses.ct: Those driven by selfish ambition preach Christ with impure motives, thinking they can pile more trouble on top of my chains.

verses.kjv: But the other of love, knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel.
verses.web: but the latter out of love, knowing that I am appointed for the defense of the Good News.
verses.ct: But the others preach out of love, knowing that God placed me here to defend the gospel.

verses.kjv: What then? notwithstanding, every way, whether in pretence, or in truth, Christ is preached; and I therein do rejoice, yea, and will rejoice.
verses.web: What does it matter? Only that in every way, whether in pretense or in truth, Christ is proclaimed. I rejoice in this, yes, and will rejoice.
verses.ct: So what does it matter? Either way — whether their motives are fake or sincere — Christ is being proclaimed. That makes me glad, and I'll keep on being glad.

verses.kjv: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer, and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
verses.web: For I know that this will turn out to my salvation, through your prayers and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ,
verses.ct: I know that through your prayers and the help of the Spirit of Jesus Christ, all of this will lead to my salvation.

verses.kjv: According to my earnest expectation and my hope, that in nothing I shall be ashamed, but that with all boldness, as always, so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body, whether it be by life, or by death.
verses.web: according to my earnest expectation and hope, that I will in no way be disappointed, but with all boldness, as always, now also Christ will be magnified in my body, whether by life or by death.
verses.ct: My deep hope and expectation is that I won't be put to shame in any way. Instead, with complete boldness — just as always — Christ will be honored through my body, whether I live or whether I die.

verses.kjv: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
verses.web: For to me to live is Christ, and to die is gain.
verses.ct: For me, living means Christ, and dying is gain.

verses.kjv: But if I live in the flesh, this is the fruit of my labour: yet what I shall choose I wot not.
verses.web: But if I live on in the flesh, this will bring fruit from my work; yet I don’t know what I will choose.
verses.ct: But if I go on living in this body, that means fruitful work for me. Honestly, I don't know which I would choose.

verses.kjv: For I am in a strait betwixt two, having a desire to depart, and to be with Christ; which is far better:
verses.web: But I am hard pressed between the two, having the desire to depart and be with Christ, which is far better.
verses.ct: I'm torn between the two. Part of me longs to leave this life and be with Christ, which would be far better.

verses.kjv: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you.
verses.web: Yet to remain in the flesh is more needful for your sake.
verses.ct: But staying alive in this body is more necessary for your sake.

verses.kjv: And having this confidence, I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith;
verses.web: Having this confidence, I know that I will remain, yes, and remain with you all for your progress and joy in the faith,
verses.ct: Since I'm convinced of this, I know I'll remain and continue with all of you, helping you grow and find joy in your faith.

verses.kjv: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again.
verses.web: that your rejoicing may abound in Christ Jesus in me through my presence with you again.
verses.ct: That way, when I come to you again, you'll have even more reason to rejoice in Christ Jesus because of me.

verses.kjv: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ: that whether I come and see you, or else be absent, I may hear of your affairs, that ye stand fast in one spirit, with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel;
verses.web: Only let your way of life be worthy of the Good News of Christ, that whether I come and see you or am absent, I may hear of your state, that you stand firm in one spirit, with one soul striving for the faith of the Good News;
verses.ct: Above all, live in a way that's worthy of the gospel of Christ. Then, whether I come and see you in person or only hear about you from a distance, I'll know that you're standing firm together in one spirit, fighting side by side for the faith of the gospel.

verses.kjv: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries: which is to them an evident token of perdition, but to you of salvation, and that of God.
verses.web: and in nothing frightened by the adversaries, which is for them a proof of destruction, but to you of salvation, and that from God.
verses.ct: Don't be intimidated in any way by those who oppose you. Your courage is a clear sign to them that they're headed for destruction — but for you, it's a sign of salvation, and that comes from God.

verses.kjv: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ, not only to believe on him, but also to suffer for his sake;
verses.web: Because it has been granted to you on behalf of Christ, not only to believe in him, but also to suffer on his behalf,
verses.ct: God has given you the privilege not only of believing in Christ, but also of suffering for his sake.

verses.kjv: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me, and now hear to be in me.
verses.web: having the same conflict which you saw in me and now hear is in me.
verses.ct: You're going through the same struggle you once watched me face — and that you hear I'm still facing now.
